jnxIpSecFlowMonMIB.name: jnxIpSecFlowMonMIB

revisions.description: Revised the MIB to exlude platform/product specific attributes
Consolidated TC duplicated b/n jnx-ipsec-flow-mon.mib, jnx-ipsec-monitor-asp.mib

jnxIpSecFlowMonMIB.contactinfo: Juniper Technical Assistance Center Juniper Networks, Inc. 1194 N. Mathilda Avenue Sunnyvale, CA 94089 E-mail: support@juniper.net
jnxIpSecFlowMonMIB.description: This module defines the object used to monitor the entries pertaining to IPSec objects and the management of the IPSEC VPN functionalities. tables: - IKE tunnel table - IPSec tunnel table - IPSec security associations table. This mib module is based on JNX-IPSEC-MONITOR-MIB. Building on the existing IKE infrastruature, the security IKE implementation integrates the value-added features for the security products

JnxIkePeerType.name: JnxIkePeerType
JnxIkePeerType.description: The type of IPsec Phase-1 IKE peer identity. It is the local IKE identify to send in the exchange. The IKE peer may be identified by one of the ID types defined in IPSEC DOI. idIpv4Addr - IPv4 Address. idIpv6Addr - IPv6 Address. idUfqdn - user fully qualified domain name (user@hostname). idFqdn - full qualified domain name idDn - distinquished name

JnxIkeNegoMode.name: JnxIkeNegoMode
JnxIkeNegoMode.description: The IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiation mode. Main Mode: A six-message Phase 1 exchange that provides identity protection. Aggressive mode: a three-message phase 1 exchange that does not provide identity protection

JnxIkeHashAlgo.name: JnxIkeHashAlgo
JnxIkeHashAlgo.description: The hash algorithm used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

JnxIkeAuthMethod.name: JnxIkeAuthMethod
JnxIkeAuthMethod.description: The authentication method used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

JnxIkePeerRole.name: JnxIkePeerRole
JnxIkePeerRole.description: Role of the local endpoint in negotiating the IPsec Phase-1 IKE security association. It can be either Initiator or Responder.

JnxIkeTunStateType.name: JnxIkeTunStateType
JnxIkeTunStateType.description: State of the Phase-1 IKE negotiation.

JnxDiffHellmanGrp.name: JnxDiffHellmanGrp
JnxDiffHellmanGrp.description: The Diffie Hellman Group used in negotiations. modp768 -- 768-bit MODP modp1024 -- 1024-bit MODP modp1536 -- 1536-bit MODP modp2048 -- 2048-bit MODP ec-modp256 -- 256-bit EC-MODP ec-modp384 -- 384-bit EC-MODP

JnxKeyType.name: JnxKeyType
JnxKeyType.description: The type of key used by an IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

JnxEncapMode.name: JnxEncapMode
JnxEncapMode.description: The encapsulation mode used by an IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

JnxEncryptAlgo.name: JnxEncryptAlgo
JnxEncryptAlgo.description: The encryption algorithm used in negotiations.

JnxAuthAlgo.name: JnxAuthAlgo
JnxAuthAlgo.description: The authentication algorithm used by a security association of an IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

JnxRemotePeerType.name: JnxRemotePeerType
JnxRemotePeerType.description: The type of the remote peer gateway (endpoint). It can be one of the following two types: - static (Remote peer whose IP address is known beforehand) - dynamic (Remote peer whose IP address is not known beforehand).

JnxSpiType.name: JnxSpiType
JnxSpiType.description: The type of the SPI associated with IPsec Phase-2 security associations.

jnxIkeNumOfTunnels.name: jnxIkeNumOfTunnels
jnxIkeNumOfTunnels.description: Number of IKE Tunnels (phase-1) actively negotiating between peers. The SA can be in either the up or down state. This attribute should detail the number of IKE tunnels in jnxIkeTunnelMonTable.

jnxIkeTunnelMonTable.name: jnxIkeTunnelMonTable
jnxIkeTunnelMonTable.description: The IPsec Phase-1 Internet Key Exchange Tunnel Table. There is one entry in this table for each active IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunnelMonEntry.name: jnxIkeTunnelMonEntry
jnxIkeTunnelMonEntry.description: Each entry contains the attributes associated with an active IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunMonRemoteGwAddrType.name: jnxIkeTunMonRemoteGwAddrType
jnxIkeTunMonRemoteGwAddrType.description: The IP address type of the remote gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunMonRemoteGwAddr.name: jnxIkeTunMonRemoteGwAddr
jnxIkeTunMonRemoteGwAddr.description: The IP address of the remote gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunMonIndex.name: jnxIkeTunMonIndex
jnxIkeTunMonIndex.description: The index of the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel Table. The value of the index is a number which begins at one and is incremented with each tunnel that is created. The value of this object will wrap at 2,147,483,647.

jnxIkeTunMonLocalGwAddr.name: jnxIkeTunMonLocalGwAddr
jnxIkeTunMonLocalGwAddr.description: The IP address of the local endpoint (gateway) for the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunMonLocalGwAddrType.name: jnxIkeTunMonLocalGwAddrType
jnxIkeTunMonLocalGwAddrType.description: The IP address type of the local endpoint (gateway) for the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunMonState.name: jnxIkeTunMonState
jnxIkeTunMonState.description: The state of the IKE tunnel, It can be: 1. up - negotiation completed 2. down- being negotiated

jnxIkeTunMonInitiatorCookie.name: jnxIkeTunMonInitiatorCookie
jnxIkeTunMonInitiatorCookie.description: Cookie as generated by the peer that initiated the IKE Phase-1 negotiation. This cookie is carried in the ISAKMP header.

jnxIkeTunMonResponderCookie.name: jnxIkeTunMonResponderCookie
jnxIkeTunMonResponderCookie.description: Cookie as generated by the peer responding to the IKE Phase-1 negotiation initiated by the remote peer. This cookie is carried in the ISAKMP header.

jnxIkeTunMonLocalRole.name: jnxIkeTunMonLocalRole
jnxIkeTunMonLocalRole.description: The role of local peer identity. The Role of the local peer can be: 1. initiator. 2. or responder.

jnxIkeTunMonLocalIdType.name: jnxIkeTunMonLocalIdType
jnxIkeTunMonLocalIdType.description: The type of local peer identity. The local peer may be identified by: 1. an IP address, or 2. or a fully qualified domain name string. 3. or a distinguished name string.

jnxIkeTunMonLocalIdValue.name: jnxIkeTunMonLocalIdValue
jnxIkeTunMonLocalIdValue.description: The value of the local peer identity. If the local peer type is an IP Address, then this is the IP Address used to identify the local peer. If the local peer type is id_fqdn, then this is the FQDN of the remote peer. If the local peer type is a id_dn, then this is the distinguished name string of the local peer.

jnxIkeTunMonLocalCertName.name: jnxIkeTunMonLocalCertName
jnxIkeTunMonLocalCertName.description: Name of the certificate used for authentication of the local tunnel endpoint. This object will have some valid value only if negotiated IKE authentication method is other than pre-saherd key. If the IKE negotiation do not use certificate based authentication method, then the value of this object will be a NULL string.

jnxIkeTunMonRemoteIdType.name: jnxIkeTunMonRemoteIdType
jnxIkeTunMonRemoteIdType.description: The type of remote peer identity. The remote peer may be identified by: 1. an IP address, or 2. or a fully qualified domain name string. 3. or a distinguished name string.

jnxIkeTunMonRemoteIdValue.name: jnxIkeTunMonRemoteIdValue
jnxIkeTunMonRemoteIdValue.description: The value of the remote peer identity. If the remote peer type is an IP Address, then this is the IP Address used to identify the remote peer. If the remote peer type is id_fqdn, then this is the FQDN of the remote peer. If the remote peer type is a id_dn, then this is the distinguished named string of the remote peer.

jnxIkeTunMonNegoMode.name: jnxIkeTunMonNegoMode
jnxIkeTunMonNegoMode.description: The negotiation mode of the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel.

jnxIkeTunMonDiffHellmanGrp.name: jnxIkeTunMonDiffHellmanGrp
jnxIkeTunMonDiffHellmanGrp.description: The Diffie Hellman Group used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

jnxIkeTunMonEncryptAlgo.name: jnxIkeTunMonEncryptAlgo
jnxIkeTunMonEncryptAlgo.description: The encryption algorithm used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

jnxIkeTunMonHashAlgo.name: jnxIkeTunMonHashAlgo
jnxIkeTunMonHashAlgo.description: The hash algorithm used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

jnxIkeTunMonAuthMethod.name: jnxIkeTunMonAuthMethod
jnxIkeTunMonAuthMethod.description: The authentication method used in IPsec Phase-1 IKE negotiations.

jnxIkeTunMonLifeTime.name: jnxIkeTunMonLifeTime
jnxIkeTunMonLifeTime.description: The negotiated LifeTime of the IPsec Phase-1 IKE Tunnel in seconds.

jnxIkeTunMonActiveTime.name: jnxIkeTunMonActiveTime
jnxIkeTunMonActiveTime.description: The length of time the IPsec Phase-1 IKE tunnel has been active in hundredths of seconds.

jnxIkeTunMonInOctets.name: jnxIkeTunMonInOctets
jnxIkeTunMonInOctets.description: The total number of octets received by this IPsec Phase-1 IKE security association.

jnxIkeTunMonInPkts.name: jnxIkeTunMonInPkts
jnxIkeTunMonInPkts.description: The total number of packets received by this IPsec Phase-1 IKE security association.

jnxIkeTunMonOutOctets.name: jnxIkeTunMonOutOctets
jnxIkeTunMonOutOctets.description: The total number of octets sent by this IPsec Phase-1 IKE security association.

jnxIkeTunMonOutPkts.name: jnxIkeTunMonOutPkts
jnxIkeTunMonOutPkts.description: The total number of packets sent by this IPsec Phase-1 IKE security association.

jnxIkeTunMonXAuthUserId.name: jnxIkeTunMonXAuthUserId
jnxIkeTunMonXAuthUserId.description: The extended Authentication (XAuth) User Identifier, identifies the user associated with this IPSec Phase negotiation.

jnxIkeTunMonDPDDownCount.name: jnxIkeTunMonDPDDownCount
jnxIkeTunMonDPDDownCount.description: The number of times that the remote peer is detected in a dead (or down) state. This attribute is obsolete

jnxIpSecNumOfTunnels.name: jnxIpSecNumOfTunnels
jnxIpSecNumOfTunnels.description: Number of IPSEC VPN Tunnels. This attribute should detail the number of IPSEC VPN tunnel in jnxIpSecTunnelTable.

jnxIpSecTunnelMonTable.name: jnxIpSecTunnelMonTable
jnxIpSecTunnelMonTable.description: The IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel Table. There is one entry in this table for each active IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel. If the tunnel is terminated, then the entry is no longer available after the table has been refreshed.

jnxIpSecTunnelMonEntry.name: jnxIpSecTunnelMonEntry
jnxIpSecTunnelMonEntry.description: Each entry contains the attributes associated with an active IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonRemoteGwAddrType.name: jnxIpSecTunMonRemoteGwAddrType
jnxIpSecTunMonRemoteGwAddrType.description: The IP address type of the remote gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonRemoteGwAddr.name: jnxIpSecTunMonRemoteGwAddr
jnxIpSecTunMonRemoteGwAddr.description: The IP address of the remote gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonIndex.name: jnxIpSecTunMonIndex
jnxIpSecTunMonIndex.description: The index of the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel Table. The value of the index is a number which begins at one and is incremented with each tunnel that is created. The value of this object will wrap at 2,147,483,647.

jnxIpSecTunMonLocalGwAddrType.name: jnxIpSecTunMonLocalGwAddrType
jnxIpSecTunMonLocalGwAddrType.description: The IP address type of the local gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonLocalGwAddr.name: jnxIpSecTunMonLocalGwAddr
jnxIpSecTunMonLocalGwAddr.description: The IP address of the local gateway (endpoint) for the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonKeyType.name: jnxIpSecTunMonKeyType
jnxIpSecTunMonKeyType.description: The type of key used by the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel. It can be one of the following two types: - IKE negotiated - Manually installed

jnxIpSecTunMonRemotePeerType.name: jnxIpSecTunMonRemotePeerType
jnxIpSecTunMonRemotePeerType.description: The type of the remote peer gateway (endpoint). It can be one of the following two types: - static (Remote peer whose IP address is known beforehand) - dynamic (Remote peer whose IP address is not known beforehand)

jnxIpSecTunMonOutEncryptedBytes.name: jnxIpSecTunMonOutEncryptedBytes
jnxIpSecTunMonOutEncryptedBytes.description: Number of bytes encrypted by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonOutEncryptedPkts.name: jnxIpSecTunMonOutEncryptedPkts
jnxIpSecTunMonOutEncryptedPkts.description: Number of packets encrypted by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonInDecryptedBytes.name: jnxIpSecTunMonInDecryptedBytes
jnxIpSecTunMonInDecryptedBytes.description: Number of bytes decrypted by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonInDecryptedPkts.name: jnxIpSecTunMonInDecryptedPkts
jnxIpSecTunMonInDecryptedPkts.description: Number of packets decrypted by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonAHInBytes.name: jnxIpSecTunMonAHInBytes
jnxIpSecTunMonAHInBytes.description: Number of incoming bytes authenticated using AH by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonAHInPkts.name: jnxIpSecTunMonAHInPkts
jnxIpSecTunMonAHInPkts.description: Number of incoming packets authenticated using AH by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonAHOutBytes.name: jnxIpSecTunMonAHOutBytes
jnxIpSecTunMonAHOutBytes.description: Number of outgoing bytes applied AH by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonAHOutPkts.name: jnxIpSecTunMonAHOutPkts
jnxIpSecTunMonAHOutPkts.description: Number of outgoing packets applied AH by this Phase-2 tunnel.

jnxIpSecTunMonReplayDropPkts.name: jnxIpSecTunMonReplayDropPkts
jnxIpSecTunMonReplayDropPkts.description: Number of packets dropped by this Phase-2 tunnel due to anti replay check failure.

jnxIpSecTunMonAhAuthFails.name: jnxIpSecTunMonAhAuthFails
jnxIpSecTunMonAhAuthFails.description: Number of packets received by this Phase-2 tunnel that failed AH authentication.

jnxIpSecTunMonEspAuthFails.name: jnxIpSecTunMonEspAuthFails
jnxIpSecTunMonEspAuthFails.description: Number of packets received by this Phase-2 tunnel that failed ESP authentication.

jnxIpSecTunMonDecryptFails.name: jnxIpSecTunMonDecryptFails
jnxIpSecTunMonDecryptFails.description: Number of packets received by this Phase-2 tunnel that failed decryption.

jnxIpSecTunMonBadHeaders.name: jnxIpSecTunMonBadHeaders
jnxIpSecTunMonBadHeaders.description: Number of packets received by this Phase-2 tunnel that failed due to bad headers.

jnxIpSecTunMonBadTrailers.name: jnxIpSecTunMonBadTrailers
jnxIpSecTunMonBadTrailers.description: Number of packets received by this Phase-2 tunnel that failed due to bad ESP trailers.

jnxIpSecTunMonDroppedPkts.name: jnxIpSecTunMonDroppedPkts
jnxIpSecTunMonDroppedPkts.description: Total number of dropped packets for this Phase-2 tunnel. This attribute is obsolete.

jnxIpSecSaMonTable.name: jnxIpSecSaMonTable
jnxIpSecSaMonTable.description: The IPsec Phase-2 Security Association Table. This table identifies the structure (in terms of component SAs) of each active Phase-2 IPsec tunnel. This table contains an entry for each active and expiring security association and maps each entry in the active Phase-2 tunnel table (ipSecTunTable) into a number of entries in this table. SA contains the information negotiated by IKE. The SA is like a contract laying out the rules of the VPN connection for the duration of the SA. An SA is assigned a 32-bit number that, when used in conjunction with the destination IP address, uniquely identifies the SA. This number is called the Security Parameters Index or SPI. IPSec SAs area unidirectional and they are unique in each security protocol. A set of SAs are needed for a protected data pipe, one per direction per protocol.

jnxIpSecSaMonEntry.name: jnxIpSecSaMonEntry
jnxIpSecSaMonEntry.description: Each entry contains the attributes associated with active and expiring IPsec Phase-2 security associations.

jnxIpSecSaMonIndex.name: jnxIpSecSaMonIndex
jnxIpSecSaMonIndex.description: The index, in the context of the IPsec tunnel ipSecTunIndex, of the security association represented by this table entry. The value of this index is a number which begins at one and is incremented with each SPI associated with an IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel. The value of this object will wrap at 65535.

jnxIpSecSaMonProtocol.name: jnxIpSecSaMonProtocol
jnxIpSecSaMonProtocol.description: The index, represents the security protocol (AH, ESP or IPComp) for which this security association was setup.

jnxIpSecSaMonInSpi.name: jnxIpSecSaMonInSpi
jnxIpSecSaMonInSpi.description: The value of the incoming SPI.

jnxIpSecSaMonOutSpi.name: jnxIpSecSaMonOutSpi
jnxIpSecSaMonOutSpi.description: The value of the outgoing SPI.

jnxIpSecSaMonType.name: jnxIpSecSaMonType
jnxIpSecSaMonType.description: This field represents the type of security associations which can be either manual or dynamic

jnxIpSecSaMonEncapMode.name: jnxIpSecSaMonEncapMode
jnxIpSecSaMonEncapMode.description: The encapsulation mode used by an IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel.

jnxIpSecSaMonLifeSize.name: jnxIpSecSaMonLifeSize
jnxIpSecSaMonLifeSize.description: The negotiated LifeSize of the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel in kilobytes.

jnxIpSecSaMonLifeTime.name: jnxIpSecSaMonLifeTime
jnxIpSecSaMonLifeTime.description: The negotiated LifeTime of the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel in seconds.

jnxIpSecSaMonActiveTime.name: jnxIpSecSaMonActiveTime
jnxIpSecSaMonActiveTime.description: The length of time the IPsec Phase-2 Tunnel has been active in hundredths of seconds.

jnxIpSecSaMonLifeSizeThreshold.name: jnxIpSecSaMonLifeSizeThreshold
jnxIpSecSaMonLifeSizeThreshold.description: The security association LifeSize refresh threshold in kilobytes.

jnxIpSecSaMonLifeTimeThreshold.name: jnxIpSecSaMonLifeTimeThreshold
jnxIpSecSaMonLifeTimeThreshold.description: The security association LifeTime refresh threshold in seconds.

jnxIpSecSaMonEncryptAlgo.name: jnxIpSecSaMonEncryptAlgo
jnxIpSecSaMonEncryptAlgo.description: The Encryption algorithm used to encrypt the packets which can be either es-cbc or 3des-cbc.

jnxIpSecSaMonAuthAlgo.name: jnxIpSecSaMonAuthAlgo
jnxIpSecSaMonAuthAlgo.description: The algorithm used for authentication of packets which can be hmac-md5-96 or hmac-sha1-96 or hmac-sha-256-128

jnxIpSecSaMonState.name: jnxIpSecSaMonState
jnxIpSecSaMonState.description: This column represents the status of the security association represented by this table entry. If the status of the SA is 'active', the SA is ready for active use. The status 'expiring' represents any of the various states that the security association transitions through before being purged.
